name: Silky Way
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD to move the spiders.

Arrow keys to switch spider selection. Hold Ctrl to select multiple spiders.

Mouse click to switch spider selection. Drag to select multiple spiders.

K to kill selected spiders (useful if you get stuck but don't want to restart).

R to restart.

Escape to enter level selection screen (or quit from that screen).

M to mute.

Global Game Jam 2018 game - details here:

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/silky-way

This game is currently in v1.3 - the game jam version( v1.0) can still be downloaded, but it is buggier and a bit incomplete.
